sentences.sContent: They have begun a hunger strike in protest at the alleged beating.
sentences.sCn: 他们已经开始了绝食以抗议所指称的打人事件。

synos.tran: 所谓的；声称的；被断言的
宣称（allege的过去式和过去分词）；断言

remMethod.val: 来自allege (宣称) + d → 声称的

words.tran: 宣称，断言；提出…作为理由

trans.tranCn: 所谓的；声称的；被断言的
trans.tranOther: an alleged crime, fact etc is one that someone says has happened or is true, although it has not been proved

trans.tranCn: 宣称（allege的过去式和过去分词）；断言
